mapper.select: SELECT A.CMPLX_ID AS CMPLX_ID, A.CMPLX_NM AS CMPLX_NM, A.CMPLX_S_NM AS CMPLX_S_NM, B.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE AS CMPLX_GRP, B.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID AS CMPLX_GRP_ID, A.CL_LOGO_IMG_SRC AS CL_LOGO_IMG_SRC, A.CL_MAP_SRC AS CL_MAP_SRC, A.CMPLX_CD AS CMPLX_CD, A.LATI_POS AS LATI_POS, A.LONG_POS AS LONG_POS, A.UNIT_CNT AS UNIT_CNT, A.ADDR AS ADDR, A.ADDR_DTL AS ADDR_DTL, A.ADDR1 AS ADDR1, A.ADDR2 AS ADDR2, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CMPLX_GRP, CMPLX_NM ASC) AS RNUM, COUNT(1) OVER() AS TOT FROM ( SELECT CMPLX.CMPLX_ID AS CMPLX_ID, CMPLX.CMPLX_CD AS CMPLX_CD, CMPLX.CMPLX_NM AS CMPLX_NM, -- COMPLEX NAME CMPLX.CMPLX_S_NM AS CMPLX_S_NM, CMPLX.LATI_POS AS LATI_POS, CMPLX.LONG_POS AS LONG_POS, CMPLX.UNIT_CNT AS UNIT_CNT, CMPLX.ADDR AS ADDR, -- 일반 주소 CMPLX.ADDR_DTL, CMPLX.ADDR1, CMPLX.ADDR2, CMPLX.LOC1_NM, CMPLX.LOC2_NM, CMPLX.POST_NO, CMPLX.IMG_SRC, CMPLX.MAP_SRC, CMPLX.LOGO_IMG_SRC, CMPLX.ADMIN_ID AS IOK_ADMIN_ID, CMPLX.REG_ID AS IOK_REG_ID, CMPLX.REG_DT AS IOK_REG_DT, CMPLX.CHG_ID AS IOK_CHG_ID, CMPLX.CHG_DT AS IOK_CHG_DT, CMPLX_EXT.CL_MAP_SRC AS CL_MAP_SRC, CMPLX_EXT.CL_LOGO_IMG_SRC AS CL_LOGO_IMG_SRC, CMPLX_EXT.FEED_WRITE_ALLOW_YN AS FEED_WRITE_ALLOW_YN, CMPLX_EXT.REG_DT AS REG_DT, CMPLX_EXT.REG_ADMIN_IDX AS REG_ADMIN_IDX, CMPLX_EXT.UPD_DT AS UPD_DT, CMPLX_EXT.UPD_ADMIN_IDX AS UPD_ADMIN_IDX FROM COMPLEX_M AS CMPLX LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_M_EXT AS CMPLX_EXT ON CMPLX.CMPLX_ID = CMPLX_EXT.CMPLX_ID WHERE CMPLX.CMPLX_GB_CD = 'AD01102' -- # CommonLife현장 == 'AD01102' ) AS A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CMPLX_ID, CMPLX_GRP_TYPE, GRP.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID FROM COMPLEX_GRP_TYPE_M AS GRP_TYPE LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_GRP_M AS GRP ON GRP_TYPE.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID = GRP.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID ) AS B ON A.CMPLX_ID = B.CMPLX_ID ORDER BY RNUM ;

SELECT C.CMPLX_ID, CMPLX_CD, -- COMPLEX CODE CMPLX_NM, -- COMPLEX NAME CMPLX_S_NM, -- COMPLEX SUB NAME LATI_POS, LONG_POS, UNIT_CNT, -- 개수 ADDR, ADDR_DTL, -- 상세 주소 ADDR1, ADDR2, LOC1_NM, LOC2_NM, LOC3_NM, POST_NO, IMG_SRC, MAP_SRC, LOGO_IMG_SRC, -- LOGO IMAGE SOURCE MNL_SRC, -- ?? CL_CMPLX_NM, CL_CMPLX_ADDR, CL_MAP_SRC, CL_LOGO_IMG_SRC, FEED_WRITE_ALLOW_YN, IOT_USE_YN FROM COMPLEX_M AS C LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_M_EXT AS C_E ON C.CMPLX_ID = C_E.CMPLX_ID WHERE C.CMPLX_ID = #{cmplxId} AND C.CMPLX_GB_CD = 'AD01102' -- # CommonLife현장 == 'AD01102' ;

SELECT CMPLX.CMPLX_ID, GRP_TYPE.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID AS CMPLX_GRP_ID, GRP_TYPE.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE AS CMPLX_GRP, CMPLX.CMPLX_NM, -- COMPLEX NAME CMPLX.ADDR, -- 일반 주소 CMPLX.ADDR_DTL, -- 상세 주소 CMPLX.ADDR1, CMPLX.ADDR2, CMPLX_EXT.CL_MAP_SRC, -- CommonLife's Map Src/Url CMPLX_EXT.CL_LOGO_IMG_SRC -- CommonLife's LOGO Image Source FROM COMPLEX_M AS CMPLX LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_M_EXT AS CMPLX_EXT ON CMPLX.CMPLX_ID = CMPLX_EXT.CMPLX_ID LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_GRP_M AS GRP ON GRP.CMPLX_ID = CMPLX.CMPLX_ID LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_GRP_TYPE_M AS GRP_TYPE ON GRP.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID = GRP_TYPE.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID WHERE CMPLX.CMPLX_GB_CD = 'AD01102' -- # CommonLife현장 == 'AD01102' AND GRP_TYPE.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID > 0 AND !ISNULL(GRP_TYPE.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID) ORDER BY CMPLX_GRP_ID, CMPLX.CMPLX_NM ASC ;
